entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Weyburn 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
